entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Jasper
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 3:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
